title: Maksim Semakin
text:
Maksim Valeryevich Semakin (; born 26 October 1983) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays as a <a href="defensive%20midfielder">defensive midfielder</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Ufa">FC Ufa</a> on 8 August 2014 in a game against <a href="FC%20Amkar%20Perm">FC Amkar Perm</a>.
